articles.author: Vatsal Vora
articles.title: Is Cristiano Ronaldo playing for Al-Nassr against Al-Fateh tonight? - Sportskeeda
articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo is expected to start when Al-Nassr travel to Al-Fateh in the Saudi Pro League on Friday (August 25).

articles.title: 'Sachin Tendulkar Was The Highest Run-getter, We Keep Talking About One Six': Gautam Gambhir Blasts 'Hero W - News18
articles.description: Gautam Gambhir, who played a crucial 97-run knock final in the 2011 ODI WC final, pointed out the contributions of his teammates that didn't get noticed.
